sentences.en: Address is the linguistic expression of the relationships between communication participants.
sentences.cn: 称呼是谈话者之间对相互关系的语言表述.

sentences.en: For long time linguistic redundancy has been seen in its negative effects.
sentences.cn: 摘要长期以来,人们总是从负面去诠释语言冗馀.

sentences.en: Gorbachev is a master of linguistic gestures.
sentences.cn: 戈尔巴乔夫精于语言的动作.

sentences.en: Hair salon chatter is a unique linguistic phenomenon in itself.
sentences.cn: 美发沙龙中的聊天本身就是一种独特的语言现象.

sentences.en: In addition, thorough linguistic knowledge is critical to success.
sentences.cn: 此外, 全面的语言知识是成功的关键.

sentences.en: In physics, conservation laws are analogous to linguistic rules.
sentences.cn: 物理学的守恒定律类似于语言学规则.

sentences.en: Keep the conversation off linguistic matters.
Most published studies of gestures are physiological, linguistic, or psychological.
sentences.cn: 大多数已经出版的专著是生理学 、 语言学或心理学方面的.

sentences.en: Separation between linguistic signs and plastic elements; equivalence of resemblance and affirmation.
sentences.cn: 语言学符号与可塑性元素之间的区分; 相似性与确定性之间的暧昧关系,这两组微妙关联构成了古典绘画的某种不安.

sentences.en: She is pursuing her linguistic researches.
sentences.cn: 她在从事语言学的研究.

sentences.en: Spanish liberals sought to create linguistic as well as administrative uniformity.
sentences.cn: 西班牙自由主义者寻求语言及行政上的统一。

sentences.en: The ability to write is a supreme test of linguistic competence.
sentences.cn: 写作能力是对语言能力的最高形式的测试.

sentences.en: The linguistic value is used to modify main pipe reference value dynamically.
sentences.cn: 模糊控制器根据该语言描述动态修改总管给定值.

sentences.en: The word is said to be a linguistic unit that has a single meaning.
sentences.cn: 词被说成是具有单个意义的语言单位.

sentences.en: When a book goes into translation, all those linguistic subtleties get lost.
sentences.cn: 当一部书被翻译成另一种语言后，所有那些语言上的精妙之处就都丢失了。

phrases.tran_cn: 语言语境；语言的前后关系
言内意义；语学意义；语言学意义

trans.tran_en: related to language, words, or linguistics
